address: Phường Phượng Sơn, Thị xã Chũ, Tỉnh Bắc Giang
thought:
**Determining the Updated Administrative Unit**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative unit for "Phường Phượng Sơn, Thị xã Chũ, Tỉnh Bắc Giang". My process needs to be methodical. First, I need to account for any province mergers. Checking the "60-NQ/TW" document, I see that Bắc Giang was merged with Bắc Ninh, becoming simply "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh".

Now, I'll search resolutions concerning "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh".  I know the old address mentions "Phường Phượng Sơn," so I'll be looking for any resolutions dealing with that ward within the new province. Resolution "1658/NQ-UBTVQH15" is relevant. Checking that resolution, line 87 specifies the creation of a new "phường Phượng Sơn." Interestingly, it states the entire area and population of the old "Phượng Sơn," along with parts of "Quý Sơn" and "Mỹ An," are now included in this new ward. So, the name stays the same!

This means the new ward name is still "phường Phượng Sơn," and the province is now "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh".

Next, I'll need to locate the ward code for this new "phường Phượng Sơn" in "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh". Looking through the data, I found: {"ward_code":"07612","ward_name":"Phường Phượng Sơn","province_name":"Tỉnh Bắc Ninh"}.

I'm feeling pretty confident about this one. The resolution is explicit: it's not a renaming, but a restructuring. Since the resolution clearly mentions the complete inclusion of the old ward, this is a strong match.

Now, I'll put together the structured JSON output with all the relevant information.

citation.header: 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Bắc Ninh
citation.line: 87. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của phường Phượng Sơn, xã Quý Sơn và xã Mỹ An thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Phượng Sơn.
